snippet.title: Flash Flood: Red
snippet.description:
A gameplay demonstration with audio commentary of Red, a Flash game where you shoot at falling meteorites to defend your turret. (I'm doing a lousy job at making this sound as fun as it is.)

This game was reviewed in the April 2009 Flash Flood column at GameCola.net:

http://gamecola.net/2009/04/flash-flood-addicting-flash-games/

You can play the original game here:

http://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/341598

Brought to you by GameCola.net.
